about.title: About
about.body:
# Una AI Tarot: Jung üîÆ‚ú®

**Una AI Tarot: Jung** combines **Jungian archetypes** and **AI Tarot**, with optional **astrological context** for timing and transits *(Premium/Pro)*‚Äîto deliver clear, grounded interpretations that feel personal, not random.

The app is designed for introspection, insight, and better decision-making‚Äîwithout deterministic ‚Äúfortune-telling‚Äù.

---

## What you get
- üÉè **AI Tarot readings** (multiple spreads)
- üß† **Jungian archetypes** ‚Äî a **12-lesson** mini-course (symbol psychology + Tarot)
- üß© **Lesson companion spreads** ‚Äî each lesson includes a related draw and AI interpretation that connects the archetype + symbolism + your context
- ü™ê **Astro transits & timing insights** *(Premium/Pro)*
- üß† Structured, multi-layer interpretation (symbols, positions, context)
- ‚úçÔ∏è Choose a suggested question or type your own
- üìö Clean, archive-like history for re-reading

---

## Jung lessons (12 mini lessons)
The lessons are built as a short, clear guide through Jungian archetypes‚Äîand how they can be recognized through Tarot symbolism.

After each lesson, you can do a **companion spread** that Una interprets in a way that:
- connects the lesson‚Äôs archetype with the drawn cards,
- explains the dynamic (shadow, challenge, potential),
- offers reflective questions and practical guidance.

---

## How it works
1) Choose a spread or open **Jung Lessons**.
2) Pick a suggested question‚Äîor write your own.
3) Draw cards.
4) Una gives an interpretation that connects **question + layout + symbolism** (and, when relevant, the lesson/archetype).

---

## Plans & access
- üÜì **Free** ‚Äî basic access with limited spreads and features.
- üíé **Premium** ‚Äî more spreads + deeper insights + the **transits layer**.
- üßø **Pro** ‚Äî full access to all tools, advanced analysis and personalization.
- üëë **ProPlus (annual)** ‚Äî yearly plan with maximum access and best value.

üéÅ **AdReward option:** by watching an ad you can unlock certain actions as an alternative to paying.

---

## Note
- **Card of the Day** and **Yes/No** are designed as more intuitive, reflective formats.
- The app does not ‚Äúpredict fate‚Äù‚Äîit helps illuminate **patterns, options, and inner dynamics**.
- Content is educational and reflective, and is not a substitute for professional psychological/medical help.

---

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
body: We care about your privacy. This document summarizes what data we collect, why, and how we protect it.

What we collect: (a) account data (email, display name, language), (b) optional profile data (gender, birth date, sign/ascendant), (c) technical data (user ID, Expo push token, device language/region), (d) metadata about feature usage.
Where we store: Supabase (database and authentication). Expo is used for delivering push notifications (device token). Zoho Mail is used for customer support.
Why: to provide app functionality, sync settings, send notifications you request, and improve product quality.
Sharing: we do not sell personal data. We share data only with service providers necessary for the app to function (e.g., Supabase, Expo) under appropriate data processing agreements.
Retention & deletion: we keep data as long as necessary to provide the service. You can request export or deletion of your account by contacting support.
Security: we apply technical and organizational measures; however, no system is 100% secure.
Your rights: access, rectification, deletion, objection, withdrawal of consent where applicable.
Privacy contact: info@infohelm.org

By using the app you agree to these terms.

dataDeletion.title: Data Deletion
body: You can request deletion of your account and data at any time.

How to submit a request: send an email from the address linked to your account to info@infohelm.org with a short note that you want your data deleted. If possible, include your user ID (UID) from the profile.
What we delete: profile (email, display name, language preferences), saved push-notification tokens, history of readings/interpretations, and other account-related data.
What we may retain: minimal records necessary to meet legal obligations or security needs, in line with the Privacy Policy.
Timeframe: requests are usually processed within 30 days after identity confirmation.
More details and the official document version are available on our website (use the ‚ÄúOpen on web‚Äù button).
